Package nl.naturalis.geneious.gui

Class GeneiousGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.naturalis.geneious.gui.GeneiousGUI
  • public class GeneiousGUI
extends Object
    General utilities for the Geneious Desktop UI.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int DEFAULT_MIN_HEIGHT
      The minimum height given to a component if not specifiable through a method parameter.
      static int DEFAULT_MIN_WIDTH
      The minimum width given to a component if not specifiable through a method parameter.

        public static void position​(Component component)
        Positions the specified component relative to the main Geneious window as obtained by GuiUtilities.getMainFrame(). Keeps a margin of 250 pixels around the component.
